alert.note: Alert for Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft (Colorado) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued February 25 at 10:40PM MST until February 26 at 5:00PM MST by NWS Pueblo
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 8 AM TO 5 PM MST SUNDAY... * WHAT...Southwest winds 30 to 40 mph with gusts up to 75 mph expected. * WHERE...Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 and 11000 Feet, Southern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Feet, Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Feet and Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000 Feet. * WHEN...From 8 AM to 5 PM MST Sunday. * IMPACTS...Damaging winds will blow down trees and power lines. Power outages are possible. Travel will be difficult, especially for high profile vehicles.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.

area.areaDesc: Northern Sangre de Cristo Mountains Between 8500 And 11000 Ft; Southern Sangre De Cristo Mountains Between 7500 and 11000 Ft; Wet Mountain Valley Below 8500 Ft; Wet Mountains between 6300 and 10000Ft
